fields.description:
as a lbg customers viewing their upcoming payments

I want a link to be shown to direct me to the payment hub

so that I can set up a new payment easily
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am logged onto mobile browser

and I have selected to view my upcoming payments

when I scroll to the bottom of the payments

then I will see a link to 'Set Up a new payment'

 

Given that the set up a new payment link is displayed

when I click on the link

then I will be taking to the payments hub

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
as an lbg customer logged on to IB via mobile browser

I want to be able to select a date

so that I can filter the view of upcoming payments
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am logged onto mobile browser

and I have selected to view my upcoming payments from the link on the transactions page

When I select the date picker

then it will expand

and it will display a list of dates from tomorrow until 31 days from today

 

Given that I have clicked to open the drop down date picker

when I select a date within the next 31 days

then the Total number of payments will update to reflect those falling within that period

and the 'Date until' will update to reflect those falling within that period

and the list of payments will update to reflect those falling within that period

and the total of those amounts will update to reflect those falling within that period

as per design

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a LBG customer logged on via mobile browser, viewing my PCA transactions

I want to be able to see my upcoming payments in one place

so that I can better manage my finances
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am logged onto mobile browser

and I have selected to view my transactions for my PCA

and the View upcoming payments link is displayed on my transactions view

When I select/click the link

Then a new page will open displaying all upcoming payments as per design

And it will provide a summary of the total number of payments in the next 31 days by default

And a drop down date picker

And there will be a table of each payment in the next 31 days with totals defined as per business rules GIBBR902, GIBBR903, GIBBR904, GIBBR905 & GIBBR906

And a table for any new or irregular payments

And a link to view All standing orders and direct debits

And a link to set up a new payment as per design

fields.description:
As a mobile browser user

I want to be able to navigate to my upcoming payments

so that I can better  manage my finances
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am logged onto IB via mobile browser

when I select any PCA

and the transactions page has loaded

then I will see a link to 'View Upcoming Payments' as per design

 

Given that I am viewing my transactions on mobile browser

when I change the month to view

then I will still see the link to 'View Upcoming Payments'

 

Given that the 'View Upcoming Payments' link is displayed

when I select

then the upcoming payments page will display
fields.summary: NGB - Entry point to upcoming payments

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an customer viewing my transactions on my statement page

I want to be shown feedback option on the map shown to me in VTD

so that given the ability to provide feedback
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am viewing a Debit card transaction

when a map is displayed for the merchant location

then I want to see a section displaying "Did you find this map useful" as per design

and a Yes and No button

and this needs to be logged in App Dynamics 

 

Given that I am viewing a debit card VTD

when there is no map displayed

there is no feedback option

 

Given that the Yes and No buttons have been displayed

when I click either button

then I want to be given the option to provide further feedback as per design

and this needs to be logged in App Dynamics 

 

given that I am a customer using screen reader or keyboard navigation

when I want to provide feedback

then I will be able to navigate successfully

status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an IB customer logged on and viewing my statement on Desktop & NGB

I want to see a map displaying the location of my debit card transaction

so that I can better identify I made the transaction
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am an LBG customer logged onto IB on Desktop & NGB

and I am on my statement page

when I click on a DEB transaction

and the transaction detail expands

and the authorisation method is Chip & Pin or Contactless

and there is only one location response returned from Google

then I will see a map displayed of the location for that transaction

and a location pin will identify the location with address details of the merchant.

 

Given that I am on my statement page

when I click on a DEB transaction

and the transaction detail expands

and the authorisation method is Chip & Pin or Contactless

and there is either more than one location response returned from Google or no response

then I will not see a map displayed of the location for that transaction

 

Given that I have had map displayed for the location of that transaction

when I click on the location pin of the address

then the address box will close

 

Given that I have had map displayed for the location of that transaction

and I have clicked the pin to close the address box

when I click on the location pin of the address again

then the address box will open again

 

 

Given that I have expanded my VTD for my DEB transaction

when I click the transaction line again

then the expanded section will collapse

 

Given that I am a customer requiring a screen reader or a keyboard user

when I have a map displayed in VTD

then I will be able to navigate through successfully

(details to be confirmed by DAC)

fields.description: The creation of wireframes that will enable visualisation of the user experience and navigation through the proposed SPEND user journey options is required. This task should also serve as a starting point for developing/defining UI Naming Conventions

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Maps of the proposed navigation through the proposed SPEND user journey options. The navigation map should consider all scenarios of used defined and outline at a high-level.
 * Outline screens to be visited (using pseudo-names if required)
 * Outline screen sequence (in the order they are rendered/reached)
 * Provide high-level description of screen purpose and value to the user
 * Highlight screen hierarchy i.e. nesting-level
 * Outline the information displayed in each screen (IA structure)
fields.summary: Map Navigation For SPEND User Journey Options

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
Specification of plausible end-to-end user journey options for the Insights SPEND function is required. This must show at a high-level:
 * Outline the primary(and secondary) objectives of the journey
 * Outline pre-requisites/pre-conditions for success in the journey e.g. customer type, data availability, existence of specific transaction types etc.
 * Specify entry points into the journey
 * User actions/gestures required to achieve listed objectives
 * Develop alternative Scenarios of use - prerequisites for success are not in place e.g. limited transaction history, transaction type(s) not available etc.
 * Define user actions/gestures required in the alternative scenarios including the expected outcomes - final states
 * Define exit points
fields.summary: Design New SPEND User Journey Options

fields.description:
There is a legal requirement to remove any reference to any charge related to credit card charges for order a paper statement.

Initial review shows 3 places where the cost is mentioned.  Attached screenshots showing these places

 

The fee will state wither £5 or £10 depending on whether single or multiple sheets

 

There are time constraints to this.  Content must be removed by 21st September, therefore if back end change required we need to be in 18.10
fields.customfield_10011: Confirm if content is CMS managed or back end change required
fields.summary: CC order paper statement copy change

fields.description:
As a Statement product owner

I want to fetch and display all offers on a CWA page via the new APIs

So that I can verify that my Spending Rewards CWA page works on the mobile app (NGA)
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that a new CWA Spending Rewards page has been developed

And a connection between the new CWA Spending Rewards page and the Spending Rewards API has been established

And an IB test account registered for Spending Rewards has been created 

When I log into IB via mobile app (NGA)

And I access the Spending Rewards tool

Then the new CWA Spending Rewards page should launch within the mobile app

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my available offers

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my active offers 

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my expired offers

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an IB customer registered for SR 

I want all my expired SR offers to be displayed and grouped on the mobile app (NGA)

So that I am choose the number and type of expired offers I want to see
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that the SR hub has been successfully deployed in a CWA component

When I access the CWA Spending Rewards tool via the mobile app (NGA)

Then the CWA SR hub should launch within the mobile app

And I have navigated to the Expired Offers section

And the default view should display the access to my EXPIRED offers

 

AC2:

Given that I have accessed the CWA Spending Rewards tool via the mobile app (NGA)

{color:#333333}And the CWA SR hub has been launched within the mobile app{color}

And I have landed in the default view/tab - (Your offers)

And the access to my expired offers is clearly displayed in the default view

When I trigger the access to my expired offers

Then the Expired Offers section should open in the "All Offers" view – (default view)

And the "All Offers" view should display a SECTION TITLE (e.g. Expired Offers)

And the Section Title should include the TOTAL NUMBER of ALL expired offers

And the "All Offers" view should display the SR offer category filters

And the SR offer category filters should include a filter titled "*All offers*"

And all other offer category filters should display the TITLE of their SR offer category

And each offer category filter should display the NUMBER of offers they hold

And the DEFAULT state of the "*All offers*" filter should be ACTIVE

And the DEFAULT state of all other filters should be INACTIVE

And the "All Offers" view should display a logo for each expired offer

And each expired offer logo should display the date the offer expired

And each expired offer logo should display an option to VIEW details of the offer

 

 

AC3:

Given that I have accessed the SR hub via mobile app (NGA)

And the CWA SR hub has been launched within the mobile app

And I am in the All Offers view of the Expired Offers Section

And all the offer category filters are displayed

{color:#333333}And all other offer category filters are in their default state – INACTIVE{color}

When I click on ANY of the displayed filters (except "All Offers")

Then the Expired Offers section view should change to the selected filter view

And the state of the selected filter should switch from INACTIVE to ACTIVE

And the state of the "All Offers" filter should switch from ACTIVE to INACTIVE

And the enabled filter view should display the SECTION TITLE (e.g. Expired Offers)

And the Section Title should include the TOTAL NUMBER of ALL expired offers

And the enabled filter view should display a logo for each expired offer

And each expired offer logo should display the date the offer expired

And each expired offer logo should display an option to VIEW details of the offer

fields.description:
As the Statements Product Owner

I want to log all Google Maps relate errors

So that I can monitor and investigate all Google Map related errors
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that a Halifax customer has accessed IB using a mobile device (NGB)

And the customer has navigated to the Statements page 

When the customer clicks on a transaction line

And a Google Map related error occurs

Then the date/time of the error should be recorded in the AppDynamics application

And the error code of the error should be recorded in the AppDynamics application

And the error narrative of the error should be recorded in the AppDynamics application

fields.description:
As the Statements Product Owner

I want all Google Maps related errors that occur to be suppressed

So that customers do not see that Google Maps related error messages in the VTD
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that a Halifax customer has accessed IB using a mobile device (NGB)

And the customer has navigated to the Statements page 

When the customer clicks on a transaction line

And a Google Map related error occurs

Then the VTD for the selected transaction line should open

And all available details of the transaction should be displayed

And the Google Map related message should NOT be displayed to the customer

fields.description:
As a migrated MBNA IB customer

I want the access to all other non-Statements IB services

So that I can manage my MBNA product
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

When I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

Then the PAY CREDIT CARD button should be displayed

And the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER button should be displayed

And the MORE ACTIONS button should be displayed

 

AC2:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am NOT registered for PAPERLESS

When I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I select the PDF Statement tan

Then the MANAGE PAPERLESS SETTINGS button should be displayed

 

AC3:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And the PAY CREDIT CARD button should be displayed

And the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER button should be displayed

And the MORE ACTIONS button should be displayed

When I click on the PAY CREDIT CARD button

Then I should be taken to the "Ways to pay" page

And the "Ways to pay page" page should be an MBNA branded page

 

AC4:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And the PAY CREDIT CARD button should be displayed

And the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER button should be displayed

And the MORE ACTIONS button should be displayed

When I click on the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER  button

Then I should be taken to the "Balance and money transfer" page

And the "Balance and money transfer" page should be an MBNA branded page

 

 

AC5:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am NOT registered for paperless

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I select the PDF Statement tab

And the PDF Statement tab displays the MANAGE PAPERLESS SETTINGS button 

 

When I click on the MANAGE PAPERLESS SETTINGS button  

Then I should be taken to the "Manage your online and paper preferences" page

And the "Manage your online and paper preferences" page should be an MBNA branded page

 

AC6:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And the PAY CREDIT CARD button should be displayed

And the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER button should be displayed

And the MORE ACTIONS button should be displayed

When I click on the MORE ACTIONS button

Then the MORE ACTIONS drawer of available actions should open

And the MORE ACTIONS drawer should display the MANAGE CREDIT CARD LIMIT action option

And the MORE ACTIONS drawer should display the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER action option

And the MORE ACTIONS drawer should display the  PAY CREDIT CARD action option

And the MORE ACTIONS drawer should display the  ACCOUNT SERVICES action option

 

AC7:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I have opened the MORE ACTIONS drawer

When I select the MANAGE CREDIT CARD LIMIT action option

Then I should be presented with the option to INCREASE by credit limit

And I should be presented with the option to DECREASE by credit limit

And selecting the option to INCREASE should take to the "Increase your credit card limit" MBNA branded page

And selecting the option to DECREASE should take to the "Request to decrease your credit limit" MBNA branded page

 

AC8:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I have opened the MORE ACTIONS drawer

When I select the BALANCE and MONEY TRANSFER action option

Then I should be taken to the "Balance and money transfer" MBNA page

 

AC9:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I have opened the MORE ACTIONS drawer

When I select the PAY CREDIT CARD action option

Then I should be taken to the "Ways to pay" MBNA page

 

AC10:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I navigate to the Statements page of my migrated MBNA product

And I have opened the MORE ACTIONS drawer

When I select the ACCOUNT SERVICES action option

Then I should be presented with the options to:
 * Manage online and paper preferences
 * Order replacement card/PIN
 * Rename account
 * Remove additional cardholder
 * Request paper copy statement

And each option should take me to their relevant MBNA page
fields.summary: MBNA TS6 - Access Other IB Services

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a migrated MBNA IB customer

I want the ability to export my available MBNA transactions

So that I can have my transaction data in a useful format
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am in the Recent Transactions tab of my MBNA Statements page

And the EXPORT icon is displayed 

When I click on the EXPORT icon

Then the EXPORT overlay should launch

And the EXPORT overlay should display the heading: "Export credit card statement"

And the EXPORT overlay should display the sub-heading: "Current view of statement"

And the EXPORT overlay should display a tiles for my exportable data

And each tile should display the end date of the transaction period they represent

And the tile that displays the most recent transaction date should be the default selection

And the EXPORT overlay should display a FORMAT dropdown field

And the FORMAT dropdown field should contain the .CSV format option

And the FORMAT dropdown field should contain the QIF format option

And the CSV format option should be the default selection

And the EXPORT overlay should display an EXPORT button

 

AC2:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have launched the EXPORT overlay

And the EXPORT overlay displays tiles for the available transaction periods

And the EXPORT overlay displays the  FORMAT dropdown field

And the EXPORT overlay displays EXPORT button

When I select my desired transaction period tile 

And I select the .CSV format from the FORMAT dropdown field

And I click the EXPORT button/hit the ENTER key

Then all transactions in the specified period should be sent to my device

And the transactions should in the .CSV file format

 

AC3:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have launched the EXPORT overlay

And the EXPORT overlay displays tiles for the available transaction periods

And the EXPORT overlay displays the  FORMAT dropdown field

And the EXPORT overlay displays EXPORT button

When I select my desired transaction period tile 

And I select the QIF format from the FORMAT dropdown field

And I click the EXPORT button/hit the ENTER key

Then all transactions in the specified period should be sent to my device

And the transactions should in the QIF  file format

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a migrated MBNA IB customer

I want access to my available MBNA statements in PDF format

So that I have the option to view and download them
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am in the Recent Transactions tab of my MBNA Statements page

And I have discharged statements for my migrated MBNA product 

And PDF Statement tab is displayed

And PDF Statement tab does NOT have focus

When I click on PDF Statements tab

Then the Recent Transactions tab should lose focus

And the PDF Statement tab should get focus

And the PDF Statement tab should display tiles for each year that has discharged statements

And each tile should display the year they represent (YYYY)

And the current year tile (or most recent active year) should be the default selection

And a selected year tile should display all available discharged statements

And each available discharged statement should display their month and year

And a VIEW option should be displayed for each available discharged statement 

And a DOWNLOAD option should be displayed for each available discharged statement 

 

AC2:

Given that I am in the PDF Statement tab of my MBNA Statements page

And I have selected a year tile

And my selected year has discharged statements

And a VIEW option is displayed for each available discharged statement

And a DOWNLOAD option is displayed for each available discharged statement

When I select the VIEW option for a specific statement

Then a PDF reader should open in a new browser window/tab 

And the PDF reader should display the selected statement in PDF format

 

AC3:

Given that I am in the PDF Statement tab of my MBNA Statements page

And I have selected a year tile

And my selected year has discharged statements

And a VIEW option is displayed for each available discharged statement

And a DOWNLOAD option is displayed for each available discharged statement

When I select the DOWNLOAD option for a specific statement

Then a PDF version of the selected statement should be sent to a location on my device
fields.summary: MBNA TS6 - View MBNA PDF Statement

fields.description:
As a migrated MBNA IB customer

I want the ability open transactions displayed on my MBNA statement

So that I can view the available additional details on my transactions
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am in the Recent Transactions tab of my MBNA Statements page

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product 

And my transactions have additional information available

And the additional information icon is displayed next to my transactions

When I click on a transaction line on MBNA Statements page

Then the VTD for the selected transaction line should open

And the VTD should display all available additional information available

 

AC2:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I am in the Recent Transactions tab of my MBNA Statements page

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product 

And my transactions have NO additional information available

And the additional information icon is NOT displayed next to my transactions

When I click on a transaction line on MBNA Statements page

Then the VTD for the selected transaction line should NOT open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a migrated MBNA IB customer 

I want the ability to navigate my  MBNA product statement page

So that I can view both my recent and earlier transactions
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for a single period only

When I navigate to the Recent Transactions view of my MBNA Statements page

Then all my MBNA product transactions should be displayed in the Recent Transactions view of my Statement page

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISABLED

 

AC2:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the MOST RECENT period

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the ONE period beyond the most recent period

When I navigate to the Recent Transactions view of my MBNA Statements page

Then all my MBNA product transactions for the most recent  period should be displayed in the Recent Transactions view of my Statement page

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be ENABLED

 

AC3:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the MOST RECENT period

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the ONE period beyond the most recent period

And I am in the Recent Transactions view of my MBNA Statements page

And I am viewing transactions from the current period

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be ENABLED

When I click on the EARLIER navigation button

Then all my MBNA product transactions from ONE period beyond the most recent period should be displayed in the Recent Transactions view of my Statement page

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISABLED

 

AC4:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the MOST RECENT period

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the ONE period beyond the most recent period

And I am in the Recent Transactions view of my MBNA Statements page

And I am viewing transactions from the most recent period

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be ENABLED

When I click on the EARLIER navigation button

Then all my MBNA product transactions from ONE period beyond the most recent period should be displayed in the Recent Transactions view of my Statement page

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be ENABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISABLED

 

AC4:

Given that I am successfully logged into IB

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the MOST RECENT period

And I have transactions on my migrated MBNA product for the TWO periods beyond the most recent period

And I am in the Recent Transactions view of my MBNA Statements page

And I am viewing transactions from the one period beyond the most recent period

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be ENABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be ENABLED

When I click on the EARLIER navigation button

Then all my MBNA product transactions from TWO periods beyond the most recent period should be displayed in the Recent Transactions view of my Statement page

And the LATEST navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the LATEST navigation button should be ENABLED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISPLAYED

And the EARLIER navigation button should be DISABLED
fields.summary: MBNA TS6 - Navigate MBNA Statements Page

fields.description:
as a lbg customer viewing their upcoming payments
i want to be able to enter the date to which i view my upcoming payments
so that I can relate the date specific to my needs
fields.customfield_10011:
given that I am on the upcoming payments page
when I click the change date icon or the Change date wording
then the change date overlay will open

given that I have clicked the change date icon
when the change date overlay has opened
then I will see an edit date field
and I will be able to enter a date in DD/MM/YYYY format

given that I have entered a date in a DD/MM/YYYY format
and the date I enter is within the next 31 days
when I select Set Date
then the overlay will close 
and the upcoming payments page dynamic fields will update as per https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2179
and https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2178
and https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2234


given that I have entered a date in a DD/MM/YYYY format
when the date I enter is not within the next 31 days
then an error message will display advising a date within 31 days must be entered at the top of the overlay

fields.description:
as a lbg customer viewing their upcoming payments
i want to be able to select the date to which i view my upcoming payments from a calendar view
so that I can relate the date specific to my needs
fields.customfield_10011:
given that I am on the upcoming payments page
when I click the change date icon or the Change date wording
then the change date overlay will open

given that I have clicked the change date icon
when the change date overlay has opened
then I will be shown a calendar visual allowing me to select my required date
and only todays date plus 31 days will be selectable
and all other dates will be greyed out

given that the I have selected a date from the calendar
when I click to Set Date
then the overlay will close
and the results will update as per https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2179
and https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2178
and https://jira.devops.lloydsbanking.com/browse/SS-2234


Note:  there should be no accessibility requirements for screen readers on the calendar - this should not be used

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an IB customer (Retail/Business)

I want to payment hub CTA to be displayed in the VTD of relevant transactions

So that I can make a payment/transfer easily
fields.customfield_10011:
AC 1:

Given that I am a Retail customer logged into IB

And my statement page displays transactions

And all of my displayed transaction are eligible to show the payment hub CTA

(i.e. the Eligible Servicing Options field for the transaction includes the "paymentsandtransfers" value)

When a click on the transaction 

Then the VTD should open

And the VTD should display a CTA titled "Payments and transfers" 

AC2:

Given that I am a Retail customer logged into IB

And I have clicked on a transaction on my statement page

And the VTD of the selected transaction displays the "Payments and transfers"  CTA

When I click on the displayed "Payments and transfer"  CTA

Then I should be taken to the Payments and Transfers section of the Payments Hub

 

AC 3:

Given that I am a Retail customer logged into IB

And my statement page displays transactions

And none of my displayed transaction are eligible to show the payment hub CTA

(i.e. the Eligible Servicing Options field for the transaction does NOT include the "paymentsandtransfers" value)

When a click on the transaction 

Then the VTD should open

And the VTD should NOT display a CTA titled "Payments and transfers" 

 

AC 4:

Given that I am a Business customer logged into IB

And my statement page displays transactions

And all of my displayed transaction are eligible to show the payment hub CTA

(i.e. the Eligible Servicing Options field for the transaction includes the "paymentsandtransfers" value)

When a click on the transaction 

Then the VTD should open

And the VTD should display a CTA titled "Payments and transfers" 

AC5:

Given that I am a Business customer logged into IB

And I have clicked on a transaction on my statement page

And the VTD of the selected transaction displays the "Payments and transfer"  CTA

When I click on the displayed "Payments and transfer"  CTA

Then I should be taken to the Payments and Transfers section of the Payments Hub

 

AC 6:

Given that I am a Business customer logged into IB

And my statement page displays transactions

And none of my displayed transaction are eligible to show the payment hub CTA

(i.e. the Eligible Servicing Options field for the transaction does NOT include the "paymentsandtransfers" value)

When a click on the transaction 

Then the VTD should open

And the VTD should NOT display a CTA titled "Payments and transfers"
fields.summary: Display Payments Hub CTA In VTD

fields.description:
as a visually impaired user using a screen reader
i want to be notified when search results are loaded
so that i can review

when I am on the search journey
and I have selected 'search' on specific parameters
then I want to be advised to wait while results are being loaded

and I have results returned
then I want to be advised that the results have loaded
and the focus to move to the top of the table results

and there are no search within those parameters
then I want to be advised no results are returned
and focus to return to search editable fields

fields.description:
as a visually impaired customer
I want to be able to see the text that is shown to me regarding my pending transactions
so that I am made aware that no pending transactions are shown
fields.customfield_10011:
The colour contrast between the pink text and the grey background fails to meet the standard required ratio of 4.5:1.

For sites to achieve ‘Standard’ accreditation, they must comply with WCAG 2.0 checkpoint 1.4.3 for colour contrast, which is 4.5:1.
Alternatively, provide style sheets that will meet this criteria.
For sites to achieve ‘Gold’ accreditation, they must comply with WCAG 2.0 checkpoint 1.4.6 for colour contrast.
Alternatively, provide style sheets that will meet this criteria.
fields.summary: Colour contrast on pending transactions error message

fields.customfield_10011: given that I have selected to view all graphics on the print current view page when I navigate the list then the information displayed and announced needs to be descriptive, e.g. Print this page review page 12 of DAC pack Ensure that all images are given descriptive alt attributes or if they are implemented for purely decorative purposes, they can be assigned null alts. This means that screen reading software will bypass they image. Example: alt="Print this page">

fields.description:
As a LBG retail customer
I want to be able to see what monies I have left after my upcoming payments have been taken
so that I can better manage my finances
fields.customfield_10011:
given that I am logged onto IB
 when I select to view my upcoming payments
 then I will see a calculation displaying money left to spend

 

Given that I have selected a pay date

When I click save

Then the total £ amount of upcoming payments will be updated

And a left to spend £ balance will be shown

 

Given that I have clicked save

When the left to spend balance is shown

Then it will also break down the calculation displaying: Current balance; pending card transactions; upcoming payments and the left to spend calculation

 

given that the amount left to spend is displayed

when the amount goes below 0

then I will see a message displayed to advise that I do not have sufficient funds in the account and I will use the overdraft

 

given that I am already in overdraft 

when the amount left to spend remains below 0

then I will see a message displayed to advise that I do not have sufficient funds and I will continue to incur charges

fields.description:
As a lbg customer
I want to see my upcoming payments and filter the relevant ones
so that I can see how much money I have until payday
fields.customfield_10011:
given that I have logged onto IB 
and I have selected to view my upcoming payments
when I see Left to spend module 
then an option to select a pay day will be displayed

 

Given that I am on the upcoming payments  page

When select the drop down

Then a list will display of First working day of month; Last working day of month;  Last Friday of the month and individually the 1^st^ of  the month to 28^th^ of the month inclusive

 

Given that the list has displayed

When I select a date

Then the list will close

And the selected date will be visible in the combo box

 

Given that I have selected a date

When I click save

Then the whole upcoming page will refresh and update to reflect the new date

 

Given that I do not want to select a date

When I click the link stating “Not right now, I will do this later”

Then the screen will reload to default of 31 days of upcoming payments

And will show a button to set up your payment cycle

 

Given that I have entered a pay day
 when I log on the next time
 then the default display will be with the pay day showing

Given that I have entered a pay day
 when I view my upcoming payments
 then I will be able to amend the pay day or select another date to view

given that I am a joint account customer
 when I view my upcoming payments
 then both parties will be able to register and view their own pay days
 and not view the other parties pay days

fields.description:
As a Statement product owner

I want to fetch and display all offers on a CWA page via the new APIs

So that I can verify that my Spending Rewards CWA page works on desktop/NGB
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that a new CWA Spending Rewards page has been developed

And a connection between the new CWA Spending Rewards page and the Spending Rewards API has been established

And an IB test account registered for Spending Rewards has been created 

When I log into IB via desktop/NGB

And I access the new CWA Spending Rewards page

Then the new CWA Spending Rewards page should open

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my available offers

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my active offers 

And the new CWA Spending Rewards page should display all my expired offers

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an IB customer registered for SR 

I want the ability to view the details of available SR offers 

So that I well informed of what the offer is about before activating it
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that I have accessed the SR tool via desktop

And I have landed in the default view/tab

And the available SR Category icons are displayed 

When I click on a SR Category icon

And the relevant SR Category page/view is opened

Then the SR Category page/view should display a logo for each available offer

And the SR Category page/view should display a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the displayed logos should be those of the merchants making the SR offer

And each displayed offer logo should display the date the offer will expire (Or days to expiry)

And each offer logo should display an option to VIEW details about the offer

And each offer logo should display the option to ACTIVATE the offer 

And the SR Category page/view should display links to other SR Categories with available offer

And the SR Category page/view should display links to the default view/tab - (Your Offers)

 

AC2:

Given that I have accessed the SR tool via mobile app (NGA)

And the CWA SR tool has launched within the mobile app

And I have landed in the default view/tab

And the available SR Category icons are displayed 

When I click on a SR Category icon

And the relevant SR Category page/view is opened

Then the SR Category page/view should display a logo for each available offer

And the SR Category page/view should display a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the displayed logos should be those of the merchants making the SR offer

And each displayed offer logo should display the date the offer will expire (Or days to expiry)

And each offer logo should display an option to VIEW details about the offer

And each offer logo should display the option to ACTIVATE the offer 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AC3:

Given that I have opened my desired SR Category page/view (Desktop or NGA)

And the SR Category page/view displays a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the displayed logos are those of the merchants making the SR offer

And each displayed offer logo displays the date the offer will expire (Or days to expiry)

And each offer logo displays an option to VIEW details about the offer

And each offer logo displays the option to ACTIVATE the offer 

When I select the option to VIEW an offer

Then an Offer Details overlay should be launched

And the Offer Details overlay should display literature/copy about the offer

And the Offer Details overlay should display the option to close the overlay

And the Offer Details overlay should display the option to ACTIVATE the offer

 

AC4:

Given that I have selected the option to VIEW an offer in my selected SR Category page/view

And the Offer Details overlay has been launched

And the Offer Details overlay displays literature/copy about the offer

And the Offer Details overlay displays the option to CLOSE the overlay

And the Offer Details overlay displays the option to ACTIVATE the offer

When I select the option to ACTIVATE the offer

Then the Offer Details overlay should close

And the logo of the activated offer should disappear from the Available Offers section

And the logo of the activated offer should appear in the Active Offer section

And the logo of the activated offer should be place in the SR Category the offer belongs to

And the Active Offers section should increase the displayed number of offers it holds by 1

And the Active Offers SR Category icon should increase the displayed number of offers it holds by 1

 

AC5:

Given that I have selected the option to VIEW an offer in my selected SR Category page/view

And the Offer Details overlay has been launched

And the Offer Details overlay displays literature/copy about the offer

And the Offer Details overlay displays the option to CLOSE the overlay

And the Offer Details overlay displays the option to ACTIVATE the offer

When I select the option to CLOSE the Offer Details overlay

Then the Offer Details overlay should close

And I should be returned to my selected SR Category page/view

 

 

AC6:

Given that I have opened my desired SR Category page/view (Desktop or NGA)

And the SR Category page/view displays a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the displayed logos are those of the merchants making the SR offer

And each displayed offer logo displays the date the offer will expire (Or days to expiry)

And each offer logo displays an option to VIEW details about the offer

And each offer logo displays the option to ACTIVATE the offer 

When I select the option to ACTIVATE an offer

Then the logo of the activated offer should disappear from the Available Offers section

And the logo of the activated offer should appear in the Active Offer section

And the logo of the activated offer should be place in the SR Category the offer belongs to

And the Active Offers section should increase the displayed number of offers it holds by 1

And the Active Offers SR Category icon should increase the displayed number of offers it holds by 1

 

 

AC7:

Given that I am in my selected SR Category page/view

And the SR Category page/view displays a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the SR Category page/view display links to other SR Categories with available offers

And the SR Category page/view should display links to the default view/tab - (Your Offers)

When I select a link to another SR Category with available offers

Then my current SR Category page/view should close

And the SR Category page/view of the selected link should open

 

AC8:

Given that I am in my selected SR Category page/view

And the SR Category page/view displays a logo for each available offer in that SR Category

And the SR Category page/view display links to other SR Categories with available offers

And the SR Category page/view should display links to the default view/tab - (Your Offers)

When I select a link to return to the default view/tab – (Your Offers)

Then my current SR Category page/view should close

And I should be returned to the default view/tab - (Your Offers)

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As an IB customer registered for SR 

I want all my expired SR offers to be displayed and grouped on desktop/NGB

So that I am choose the number and type of expired offers I want to see
fields.customfield_10011:
{color:#333333}AC1:{color}

{color:#333333}Given that the SR hub has been successfully deployed in a CWA component{color}

{color:#333333}When I access the CWA Spending Rewards tool via desktop/NGB{color}

{color:#333333}Then the CWA SR hub should open in the default view - (Your offers){color}

{color:#333333}And the default view should display the access to my EXPIRED offers{color}

{color:#333333} {color}

 

{color:#333333} {color}

AC2:

Given that I have accessed the CWA Spending Rewards tool via desktop/NGB

And I have landed in the default view/tab - (Your offers)

And the access to my expired offers is clearly displayed in the default view

When I trigger the access to my expired offers

Then the Expired Offers section should open in the "All Offers" view – (default view)

And the "All Offers" view should display a SECTION TITLE (e.g. Expired Offers)

And the Section Title should include the TOTAL NUMBER of ALL expired offers

And the "All Offers" view should display the SR offer category filters

And the SR offer category filters should include a filter titled "*All offers*"

And all other offer category filters should display the TITLE of their SR offer category

And each offer category filter should display the NUMBER of offers they hold

And the DEFAULT state of the "*All offers*" filter should be ACTIVE

And the DEFAULT state of all other filters should be INACTIVE

And the "All Offers" view should display a logo for each expired offer

And each expired offer logo should display the date the offer expired

And each expired offer logo should display an option to VIEW details of the offer

 

 

AC3:

Given that I have accessed the SR hub via desktop/NGB

And I am in the All Offers view of the Expired Offers Section

And all the offer category filters are displayed

When I click on ANY of the displayed filters (except "All Offers)

Then the Expired Offers section view should change to the selected filter view

And the state of the selected filter should switch from INACTIVE to ACTIVE

And the state of the "All Offers" filter should switch from ACTIVE to INACTIVE

And the enabled filter view should display the SECTION TITLE (e.g. Expired Offers)

And the Section Title should include the TOTAL NUMBER of ALL expired offers

And the enabled filter view should display a logo for each expired offer

And each expired offer logo should display the date the offer expired

And each expired offer logo should display an option to VIEW details of the offer

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: Created by JIRA Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a SR registered IB customer

I want the total cashback earned to be clearly displayed

So that I am immediately and always aware of the total cashback I have earned
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1: 

Given that the SR tool has been successfully deployed in a CWA component

And  I am an IB customer registered for Spending Rewards

And I have earned Spending Rewards cashback

When I access the CWA Spending Rewards tool via desktop

Then the CWA SR tool should open in the default view/tab - (Your offers)

 And the default view/tab should display a title panel 

And the default view/tab  title panel should display the SR tool title (as per brand)

And the default view/tab  title panel should CLEARLY display the copy "*Total cashback earned:"*

And the default view/tab  title panel should CLEARLY display the value of my total cashback earned

And the value of my total cash back earned should be displayed after the copy "*Total cashback earned: <£value>"*

 

 

AC2: 

Given that the SR tool has been successfully deployed in a CWA component

And  I am an IB customer registered for Spending Rewards

And I have earned Spending Rewards cashback

When I access the CWA Spending Rewards tool via mobile app (NGA)

Then the CWA SR tool should launch within the mobile app

 And the CWA SR tool should open in the default view/tab - (Your offers)

And the default view/tab should display a title panel 

And the default view/tab  title panel should display the SR tool title (as per brand)

And the default view/tab  title panel should CLEARLY display the copy "*Total cashback earned:"*

And the default view/tab  title panel should CLEARLY display the value of my total cashback earned

And the value of my total cash back earned should be displayed after the copy "*Total cashback earned: <£value>"*

 

AC3: 

Given that the SR tool has been successfully deployed in a CWA component

And  I am an IB customer registered for Spending Rewards

And I have NOT earned Spending Rewards cashback

When I access the CWA Spending Rewards tool via desktop/mobile app

Then the CWA SR tool default view/tab should NOT display the copy "*Total cashback earned:"*

And the default view/tab  title panel should NOT display a value for my total cashback earned

fields.description:
As the Spending Rewards Product Owner

I want the Spending Rewards tool to be located into a CWA component

So that I have greater control over deploying updates and enhancement of the tool
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1:

Given that the Spending Rewards tool has been relocated in a CWA application

When a SR registered customer clicks the Spending Rewards link via desktop

Then the CWA version of the Spending Rewards tool should launch

And the .jsp version of the SR tool should not launch

 

AC2:

Given that the Spending Rewards tool has been relocated in a CWA application

When a SR registered customer clicks the Spending Rewards link via mobile app (NGA)

Then the CWA version of the Spending Rewards tool should launch

And CWA version of the Spending Rewards tool should be housed within the mobile app

And the .jsp version of the SR tool should not launch

fields.description:
As a Lloyds or Bos retail customer
I want to be able to see a link within the View Transactions expandable section
so that I can use to easily dispute a debit card payment

see proposed design on attachment
fields.customfield_10011:
Given that I am an IB registered Lloyds or Bos retail customer
and I have logged onto IB and sucessfully navigated to the statement page
when I select any of my transactions with transaction type = DEB, 
then it will expand the View transactions detail
and I will see a link entitled "I want to dispute this transaction"

Given that I have expanded my view transactions detials
when I select the link entitled "I want to dispute this transaction"
then the link will take me to TBC

Given that I am using screen readers and/or keyboard tabbing
when I open view transactions details
then the link entitled "I want to dispute this transaction" should be navigable and announced
fields.summary: Link to Dispute Debit card transactions

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a LBG retail customer with a PCA account
I want to be shown where to access my upcoming payments through the servicing options of my future dated payments
So that I can easily click through to view
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1
Given that I am on a set up payment journey
And I have selected to make a payment
When I select a recipient that I have already set up a future dated payment for
Then I will be advised that I am unable to make another payment
And I will be shown a call to action button to ‘Manage Payment’ which will take me to the upcoming payments page

AC2
Given that I am a co-servicing customers
when I log onto the non product brand
then upcoming payments will still show me the relevant future payments for that product

AC3
given that I am a visually impaired customer
when I am undertaking the journey via the servicing options
then I am able to navigate using appropriate accessibility approved methods

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a LBG retail customer with a PCA account
I want to be shown where to access my upcoming payments through the more actions options from the VPD tile
So that I can easily click through to view
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1
Given that I am on my account overview page
When I select more actions from the View product details
And I select Payments & Transactions from the menu
Then I will see the "Manage Pending Payments" button renamed to “Manage Upcoming Payments” 
And when clicked I will be taken to the Upcoming payments page

AC2
Given that I am a co-servicing customers
when I log onto the non product brand
then upcoming payments will still show me the relevant future payments for that product

AC3
Given that I am a visually impaired customers
when I complete the above journey
then the screen reader will be suitable within accessibility guidelines

fields.description:
Description:
When a user prints statements for past 3 months (around 12 pages)  around 4 times, the user is unable to edit search in statements after submitting the printing.
Gets error on the screen: Do you want to stop the script? Yes or No. No brings the popup again. On Clicking Yes the transactions are lost and replaced by a spinning wheel on the screen.

Asset name: BD0731437
Browser Version is IE8.
Account details are in the incident.

Same issue was seen before. Defect 7783 in June 2017.
REQ000002522625
fields.customfield_10011: printing should be enabled for MCA

fields.description:
As an Internet Banking user 
I want to see a message
So that I am informed that there has been a technical error preventing the retrieval of my upcoming payments
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1 
Given that I have selected the upcoming Payments Tab
When there is a technical error
Then I will see a message informing me that the list of upcoming payments is currently unavailable (MG-3264)
And the message ID is annotated in the code, but not visible to the customer

issuetype.name: Story

fields.description:
As a LBG customer on the upcoming payments page
I want to see the predicted balance after upcoming payments have been taken
So that I can see if I will go overdrawn
fields.customfield_10011:
AC1
Given that I am on the upcoming payments page
When I have direct debits, standing orders or future dated payments
Then I will see a predicted balance at the end of each day taking into consideration the upcoming payments (design on confluence)
And that balance is the Actual balance minus any upcoming payments, not including pending transactions or overdraft
